A path (blue) along which to cut a slice. The graph is made with contour_plot(). Right: Slice plot along the blue path. The graph is made with slice_plot().
A hypothetical relationship among three quantities.
Contour plot of a function with two inputs g(y,z) \equiv e^{-z}\sin(y)
Left: A slice (red) through the domain of a contour plot. Right: The value of the function along the red slice presented as a mathematical graph, generated by slice_plot().
Displaying g(y,z) \equiv e^{-z}\sin(y) as a surface plot annotated with contour lines.
Graph of the function f(y) \equiv y e^y.
Data (simulated) from the squid giant axon experiments. A smooth curve is drawn through the data points.
